content: For the "Gala for the Homeless", I actually spent $500 on a painting at the live auction, and my ticket price was $100, so I didn't really "raise" any funds there. For the "Food Drive", we collected $300 in cash donations. At the "Polar Bear Plunge", I raised $500 in donations. As for the "Animal Shelter", I don't think I raised any funds, but I've been volunteering my time regularly. Let's focus on the cash amounts for now.
